metadata.title: CVE-2024-36053 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the mintupload package through 4.2.0 for Linux Mint, service-namemishandling leads to command injection via shell metacharacters incheck_connection, drop_data_received_cb, and Service.remove. A user canmodify a service name in a ~/.linuxmint/mintUpload/services/service file.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
